name: epidemiologist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who studies diseases and how they are found, spread, and controlled in groups of people: Snowdon is an epidemiologist studying the causes of Alzheimer's disease. Epidemiologists who led the study say leafy greens and colourful vegetables are especially potent cancer fighters.
More examplesFewer examples"There's not a single cause of asthma," says epidemiologist Herman Mitchell.Epidemiologists have recently realized that children are this virus's favourite mode of transport. And we talked to state epidemiologists to look for matching factors in patients they might have.
